#summary Getting Started with glContext

= Overview =

*glContext* or how to add OpenGL capabilities to any user interface toolkits.

= Details =
*glContext* is a C library providing the needed cross-platform API to add OpenGL capabilities to any user interface toolkits (gtk/gtkmm, wxWidgets, qt and so on).
The goal of the glContext library is to build an API inspired by [http://www.cairographics.org cairo] which provides the OpenGL capabilities to any widget of any user interface toolkit and executed on any operating system.
